events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has categorized this case as a refund request due to the customer's mention of refund and wrong item.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request related to the wrong item delivered.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order and Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the mistake and proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing that the item I got is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. You do not need to return the incorrect item.
Thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate not having to return the wrong item, and I look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund has been initiated successfully. You should see the amount credited back to your account within a few days.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received the refund for your order and that everything is now satisfactory.
Since you confirmed receipt of the refund, we are closing this case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
